item.description:
ZUMBA FITNESS WITH JEANNE

The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

56 Arbor St, Suite 103, Hartforf, CT

(In the same building as Real Artways)

Bring Water, towel, and sneakers without a lot of tread and 1-3 Lb weights. Featuring: Salsa, Cumbia, Merengue, Flamenco, Samba, Belly Dance, Tango, Hip Hop, Raggae, Raggaeton, Bachata, Quebradita, Indian, Rock-N-Roll, R&B Grooves, Abs, Body Sculpting, Boxing, and who knows what else!). $5 Drop in Fee; $40 for 10-Class Card.  Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same buildingas Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: Zumba Fitness in Hartford, CT
